pub.citation: Bramley, G. L. C., 2009. The genus Callicarpa (Lamiaceae) on Borneo. Botanical Journal of the Linnean Society 159: 416-455

pmmd.notes:
Strict consensus of 12 trees of 536 steps resulting from maximum parsimony analysis of combined data set of nuclear ribosomal internal transcribed spacer (nrITS), partial matK and trnD-T sequences.
CW: Note that Callicarpa appears to still be unplaced in Lamiaceae (APweb 2008), and has not been yet been placed in this project.
